title: PM conveys condolences to Modi on mother’s death
content:
ISLAMABAD, Dec 30 (APP): Prime Minister Shehbaz Sharif on Friday conveyed his condolences to his Indian counterpart Narendra Modi on the passing away of his mother.
“There is no greater loss than losing one’s mother,” he said in a tweet.
“My condolences to Prime Minister Narendra Modi on the passing away of his mother,” he said.
